## About Me

I am a PhD student at the [**Phylomigration Lab**](https://www.phylomigrationlab.com/) at the [**Barcelona Botanical Institute (IBB)**](https://www.ibb.csic.es/ca/institut_/). My interests involve the use of **satellite remote sensing data** to track Earth's ecological processes, ranging from **Land Cover change** to **tracking migratory insects**. Despite working with data acquired hundreds of kilometers above us, I love to step firmly on the ground, observing and monitoring biodiversity. Whether it's for planning exciting research projects or simply enjoying a birdwatching session, feel free to [reach out!](mailto:roger.lopez@ibb.csic.es)
